data.title: 准备以至少20秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: In today's society, medical technology has ameliorated many aspects of people's lives, among which the most noticeable one is the extension of life expectancy. As far as I am concerned, the disadvantages of prolonging human life by using technology or medicine outweigh its advantages. It should be pointed out that living longer does not necessarily mean health. This is because the rate of getting ill increases with the growth of age. Apart from that, the financial burden of governments will be significantly larger due to the fact that everyone will be relying on medical welfare to live longer. To put it in a nutshell, considering all the factors outlined above, we may safely draw the conclusion that using technology or medicine to prolong people's life can bring adverse effects on society. (132字)
data.referenceText: Some people want to use technology or medicine to prolong their lives. What's your opinion about this?
data.referenceTranslate: 有些人想使用科技或药物来延长他们的生命。你对此有什么看法?
